item.title: O0o-need help on my server plz-o0o
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { addItem(995,1000000); sendMessage("Theres you're starter. Spend it wisely.");

Add that under any command. They can be found in client.java. E.G ::army

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("army")) { addItem(1506,1); addItem(6082,1); addItem(3389,1); addItem(6384,1); addItem(1061,1); addItem(1059,1); addItem(4343,1); addItem(1731,1); sendMessage("Heres your armyish stuff, courtesy of Bobby Lemain, the pancake man"); sendMessage("Type in ::army to do this agin (sorry, no camo yet).");

Ahh, use .Kaboom’s. His is better, it means you can only use it once. Mines wouldn’t be much of a starter now would it? :o

Read full topic

item.title: O0o-need help on my server plz-o0o
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a greedy twat who got a blackmark");

BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
blackmark +=1;
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}

}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,2000000);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}[/code]

Is the starter command change the “addItem(995,2000000);” to W/E

Read full topic
